updates.title: Fake Websites
updates.content: Please be careful of the fake websites out there, we are not affiliated with any of them and they may try to make you download a fake APK.
updates.author: ARMSX2 team

updates.title: Site Update
updates.content: The site has been created and is being maintained by @tanossh.i on Discord or tanosshi on GitHub
updates.author: tanosshi

updates.title: Demo
updates.content: ARMSX2 is a new open source emulator for the PS2, it is based on the PCSX2 emulator and aims to be the next step in PS2 emulation on Android, as well as cross platform support for iOS and Mac OS.
updates.author: polo j
